entry.def: If an aircraft or a ship yaws, it turns to one side so that it changes the direction in which it is moving.

example.ex: As the plane climbed to 370 feet, it started yawing...
example.tran: 飞机攀升到370英尺时，开始偏航。

example.ex: He spun the steering-wheel so that we yawed from side to side.
example.tran: 他急速打着舵轮，把我们搞得摇来晃去的。

means.word_mean: 1. an erratic deflection from an intended course
2. deviate erratically from a set course;

sentences.sentence: "the ship yawed when the huge waves hit it"
